attributes.action: Change the name of "King's Cross Station" to "Agincourt Station"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that Eurostar trains from France will no-longer terminate at the aptly-named "Waterloo", we should change the name of King's Cross station to "Agincourt" - thus celebrating a notable English victory and annoying the French.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
